text: I use the word 'genius' a lot because people are scared of it.
author: Kanye

text: The leader of genius must have the ability to make different opponents appear as if they belonged to one category.
author: Hitler

text: I'm not always right, but I'm never wrong.
author: Kanye

text: If you want to shine like the sun, first burn like the sun.
author: Hitler

text: I am Warhol. I am the number one most impactful artist of our generation.
author: Kanye

text: Make the lie big, make it simple, keep saying it, and eventually they will believe it.
author: Hitler

text: I feel like I'm too busy writing history to read it.
author: Kanye

text: He alone, who owns the youth, gains the future.
author: Hitler
